Name: name
Description: the name of the shared memory allocation. null for unused memory and <anonymous> for anonymous allocations.

Name: off
Description: the offset at which the allocation starts. null for anonymous allocations, since details related to them are not known.

Name: allocated_size
Description: size of the allocation including padding. for anonymous allocations, no information about padding is available, so the size and allocated_size columns will always be equal. padding is not meaningful for free memory, so the columns will be equal in that case also.
